effect.sun_moon: For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion and weakens dragon moves used against them to 0.5× their power. Changes nature power to moonblast.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion and weakens dragon moves used against them to 0.5× their power. Changes nature power to moonblast.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion and weakens dragon moves used against them to 0.5× their power. Changes nature power to moonblast.

short_effect.sun_moon: For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion, and halves the power of incoming dragon moves.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion, and halves the power of incoming dragon moves.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion, and halves the power of incoming dragon moves.

flavor_text.sun_moon: This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions and halves damage from Dragon-type moves for five turns.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions and halves damage from Dragon-type moves for five turns.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions and halves damage from Dragon-type moves for five turns.
